title: David Cameron - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office | LinkedIn

quotes: The IPCC’s three Working Group reports are expected to start appearing in mid-2028, while the Synthesis Report will be approved by late 2029.
The IPCC’s three Working Group reports are expected to start appearing in mid-2028, while the Synthesis Report will be approved by late 2029.

Launching this autumn, the new BSc (Hons) Global Infectious Disease is a pioneering undergraduate degree designed to give aspiring scientists the knowledge, skills and hands-on experience they need to confront today’s, and tomorrow’s, most pressing health challenges, from malaria and tuberculosis to HIV and emerging threats.

quotes: Exeter professors Angela Gallego-Sala, Tim Lenton and Richard Betts are in IPCC Working Group I, which examines the physical science underpinning past, present, and future climate change.

quotes: Over the course of a week, John partnered with officials from the Department for Science, Innovation & Technology (DSIT), advising on how technologies like Content Credentials from the Content Authenticity Initiative can help address misinformation, deepfakes, and synthetic media.

organizations.name: Liverpool School of Tropical Medicine
quotes: We’re pleased to announce a groundbreaking partnership between Liverpool School of Tropical Medicine and Edge Hill University, the only collaboration of its kind in the UK, to tackle deadly infectious diseases on a global scale.

organizations.name: University of Reading
quotes: A major step forward for global weather and climate research. We welcomed UK Science Minister, Patrick Vallance to the University's Whiteknights campus to mark the latest milestone in the construction of a new European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts - ECMWF headquarters at Earley Gate.

organizations.name: European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts - ECMWF
quotes: A major step forward for global weather and climate research. We welcomed UK Science Minister, Patrick Vallance to the University's Whiteknights campus to mark the latest milestone in the construction of a new European Centre for Medium-Range Weather Forecasts - ECMWF headquarters at Earley Gate.

organizations.name: UK Government
quotes: Lord Vallance joined representatives from the University, ECMWF, the UK Government, contractor Mace and other scientific partners on site for a ceremonial 'groundbreaking'.
